thread.title: Plane crashes near Melbourne airport, 5 people on board - Victoria Police
thread.title_full: Plane crashes near Melbourne airport, 5 people on board - Victoria Police

author: RT
title: Plane crashes near Melbourne airport, 5 people on board - Victoria Police
text:
Plane crashes near Melbourne airport, 5 people on board - Victoria Police   22:57 Edited time: 20 Feb, 2017 23:07 Get short URL A charter plane has crashed into the Direct Factory Outlet shopping mall near Essendon airport in Melbourne with five people on board, according to Victoria Police. 
“It appears a light plane, which is a charter flight, has impacted the DFO [shopping centre] at Essendon Fields,” Police Minister Lisa Neville told ABC news . 
The incident happened at around 9am local time. There have been no reports of fatalities as yet but emergency services are on the scene with early reports indicating up to 10 firetrucks are battling an ongoing blaze at the point of impact, as can be seen from images shared on social media. Pictures just in after a light aircraft crashed into Essendon DFO. #TMS7 pic.twitter.com/d5oZjSrCTi — The Morning Show (@morningshowon7) February 20, 2017 
The shopping center was not due to open until 10am, according to local sources. #UPDATE The DFO was not due to open to the public until 10am. @VictoriaPolice say they have no information regarding casualties. #KIISnews pic.twitter.com/qNslyXhFQQ — Clare Todhunter (@claretodhunter) February 20, 2017 A plane has crashed on approach to Essendon Airport. pic.twitter.com/mAVAMYNcDc — ABC Radio Melbourne (@abcmelbourne) February 20, 2017 The scene currently from the air over DFO near ESSENDON AIRPORT aircraft collision #Essendon pic.twitter.com/aSNLKObmmJ — Jimmy Traffic (@JimmyTraffic) February 20, 2017 
“At this stage we do not have information regarding possible casualties. Police currently evacuating area. Please avoid the area,” read a statement released by Victoria Police. Driving by a possible plane crash at #Essendon Airport and DFO pic.twitter.com/JpSCKbgxHN
